Title: Batik
Description: Batik is ASP.NET Controls & ASP.NET Ajax 4 Helper to make easier for ASP.NET Ajax client binding. You can create a two way binding (get and save) using Batik dataview. All field will be automatically filled into datasource with single line of code.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Batik is ASP.NET Controls & ASP.NET Ajax 4 Helper to make easier for ASP.NET Ajax client binding. You can create a two way binding (get and save) using Batik dataview. All field will be automatically filled into datasource with single line of code.


Using Batik, you can create ASP.NET Ajax 4 client binding without writing javascript code. Batik Dataview will manage datasource and generate proxy for binding and updating data.
All Batik controls is generic, you does not require to casting from Text into expected data-type. On specify DataType property, Batik control will be rendered as assigned datatype. Integer datatype will render numeric only textbox, DateTime datatype will render Date picker, etc.
